description: A translation is a value for a string - field, preset, tag - that is translated at runtime
title: translation

recordType.description: type of record related to the field being translated

recordId.description: the id that points to the record we want to get a translation for

fieldRef.description: the field from that record that we want to translate

languageCode.description: code that identifies the language we are translated for (for now BCP-47)
